code: import React from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function DeleteProduct(_ref){let{productId,onDeleted}=_ref;const handleDelete=async()=>{try{await axios.delete("/api/products/".concat(productId));if(onDeleted)onDeleted();}catch(err){alert('Failed to delete product');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDelete,children:"Delete Product"});}export default DeleteProduct;
